topic.title: What do you think of the surge at the southern border?
topic.body: Personally I love it ! why? first those new americans don't come to the UNO / global agenda ! they want to join the american dream !!! that's good ! secondly, they will be able to fight off those antifa/blm UNO agents !!! and have proved it many times !

1616209212_1M1U9ZvF9XJmt4oPY4TLBWHJZWDdR.body: Ladies and gentlemen, on behalf of the crew I ask that you please direct your attention to the heaven above as we review the emergency procedures. There are zero emergency exits in your area. Take a minute to locate the exit closest to you. Note that the nearest exit may be behind you. Count the number of meters to this exit. Should you experience sudden life loss, stay calm and listen for instructions from the crew. Oxygen masks should drop down from above your seat. Place the mask over your mouth and nose, like this. Pull the strap to tighten it. If you are living with children, make sure that your own grave is booked first before ordering for your children. In the unlikely event of an emergency blast and evacuation, leave your carry-on items behind. Life rafts are located below your seats and emergency lighting will lead you to your closest exit and slide. We ask that you make sure that all carry-on luggage is stowed away safely during the raid. While we wait for take off, please take a moment to review the safety data card in the seat pocket in front of you.

1616339347_1DEsTiJMbpa4RVnszAq66me45KxFx.body: ah! finally someone gets it ! furthermore this war against the UNO could be really profitable and an excellent training opportunity while being winnable ! + + +
The real question is which nation will leave this farce first, survive and thrive... I don't think the usa have anymore what it takes to be free...
the thing is that it requires trust and faith in what was build by the elders... and in the usa everything is being systematically dimantle right now... by design !

it could be the most global ruthless war ever imagined in the whole story of wars !!!! and so easy to win, just smashing whole collateral damages constellation to RUINS and RUBLES !!!! Imagine smashing to dust the HAGUE, netherland... to have those troops there, crying for mercy while their whole city burns.... same in all hives of the UNO... war and destruction, collapse and ruins, more kids death that you could produce.... 

finally a war !!! a real one !!! I can't wait to have all those bluehelmets facing systematic and methodic annihilation, reducing their spawns location to dust.... yeah yeah !!!

but noo.... in usa only gay servants of the uno... fucking braindeads!
